Add a Shop: Click on the "Add Shops" button.

Delete a Shop: Long-press on the shop you wish to remove.

View Shopping List: Tap the "My List" icon at the bottom of the screen.

Shop Name: Enter the name of the shop, then click next.

Choose Icon: Choose an Icon that to represent your shop or click the blue "a-z" icon to use initials as an icon instead.

Choose Color: Choose a color to represent your shop.

Preview: If you are happy with the preview of your shop, click "Save Shop ", or else "Start Over".

My Shopping List: Click the "Plus" button to add items to your shopping list .

View Tagged Shop(s): Once your list is populated, click the "Down" arrow to view what shop(s) each item is tagged to. Items can be deleted or edited here by clicking on their respective icon.

Sort List: Click the "A-Z" icon to view the list in "Alphabetical" order, and the "List" icon to view the order it was saved.

My Shops: Once your list is complete Click the "My Shops" button at the bottom to start shopping.

Add New Item: Type the name of the item you are adding to your list, then click the "Next" button.

Recently Purchased Items: Any items you have purchased in the last 14 days will appear, so you can just "Tap" on the item insetad of having to retype it.

Delete All Recently Purchased Items: Click the "Trash" icon to delete all recently purchased items.

Delete Single Recently Purchased Item: Long Press on the individual item will prompt for deletion.

Tag Item To Shop(s): Tag the item to any shops where it is available. You can manage your shops in the "My Shops" section.

Edit The Item: Click on the "Text" box to edit the item name.

Mark Item As Priority: Click the "Star" icon to mark the item as a priority. It will be indicated with a star in your list and the shop-specific list. Shops with priority items will be marked in the "My Shops" section.

Save Item: Click the "Save" button after assigning the item to its respective shop(s). You will be returned to your list.

Items To Acquire: Once you "Check" items from this shop it will drop it down into the "Acquired" items section.

Acquired Items: Once you have acquired your items from this shop, clicking the "Purchased" button will remove items from your list and any other shops these particular items are tagged to.

You currently have no shops.

Click on the Add Shops button to create.

For further instructions, see the User Guide located in the menu. Each section of the app has its own user guide for your convenience.
